bioconda.name: bioconductor-switchbox
bioconda.summary: Utilities to train and validate classifiers based on pair switching using the K-Top-Scoring-Pair (KTSP) algorithm

biotools.summary: The package offer different classifiers based on comparisons of pair of features (TSP), using various decision rules (e.g., majority wins principle).

bioschemas.name: switchBox
bioschemas.summary: The package offer different classifiers based on comparisons of pair of features (TSP), using various decision rules (e.g., majority wins principle).
